RESTAURANTS & BARS

The main restaurant offers various theme buttet nights on alternate such as Cyprus “meze”, Italian, Tropical (Caribbean & Oriental specialties), Fiesta Mediteranneo, Festival de specialties, BBQ, Tex – Mex., Flambé & Fish Gala dinners (are particular specialties), Soirée crêperie.

Previous Next

Special Events

Enter the world of weddings at the King Evelthon Beach Hotel & Resort and be engulfed in an atmosphere of hospitality and comfort. This is the most important day of your life and deserves to be perfect.

The Royal Beach Wedding Venue at the King Evelthon Beach Hotel & Resort is located by the sea and has everything to offer the special couple, with panoramic views of the Mediterranean crystal seas, private beach and an atmosphere to enhance your special day.
